cab.content: Military Secret.088-? G.T. 7639IjMlmjViceroij, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,mhJulyim.(Received 12th.)11th July 1919. Summary of reports from Sanmrcand and Chardjui wired by Malleson, 9th July and 10th July : 1. Conditions round Tashkeiid very disturbed. Travellers are being robbed by gangs of armed men. Slight unrest is being created owing to forcible enlistment by Bolsheviks.2. Bokhara reports great tension between Bolsheviks and inhabitants. The Mullahs in Ghizar Shar-i-Sabs Karshi and other places are inciting people to Jehad against Bolsheviks. Afghans most unpopular with Bohkarans who ridicule stories spread by Bolsheviks of Afghan victories.
